header: South Africa crush England in World Cup final
body: South Africa dominate England in the Rugby World Cup in Japan to become champions for a third time.

body: The Afghan children accidentally triggered a roadside bomb on their way to class, officials say.

header: Fracking halted after UK government pulls support
body: Drilling for shale gas will cease in England - but the government stops short of an outright ban.

body: Plainedge High School's coach will be absent because his team won by 48 points last week.
